lead_paragraph: A man was killed after he got out of his van to check on a child he had hit on a Milwaukee street. A teenager was also shot to death at the scene.

headline.print_headline: Driver Who Fatally Struck 2-Year-Old Boy Is Shot to Death
headline.main: Driver Who Fatally Struck 2-Year-Old Boy Is Shot to Death

snippet: A man was killed after he got out of his van to check on a child he had hit on a Milwaukee street. A teenager was also shot to death at the scene.
abstract: Driver Archie Brown Jr of Milwaukee, whose van struck and killed a 2-year-old boy on street, is shot to death after getting out to check on child; 15-year-old Rasheed T Chiles, brother of struck toddler, is also fatally shot; no suspects are in custody.
